ygData.subject: Re: Magical weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, If you want to be the Donald Trump of all the Paladins, head over to Rivervale. The Goblins of runnyeye wear ringmail and have weapons, all that sell for a
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

If you want to be the Donald Trump of all the Paladins, head over to
Rivervale. The Goblins of runnyeye wear ringmail and have weapons, all that
sell for a good profit. I pull in about 6 PP a night for 3 hours worth of
slaughter of the greenskins!

Dycedarg
Knight of Thunder
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan [SMTP:rwp3@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 2:03 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Magical weapons
>
> From: Ryan <rwp3@...>
>
>
> I was just wondering if anyone knew of a place I might find a magical
> weapon of some sort. Nothing really powerfull, I'm only 10th lvl right
> now, I just need something that will do damage to iceboned skeletons and
> ghouls. Also, I seem to be making money very slowly. The only trade skills
> I have are cooking and a little blacksmithing. Is there a good zone to
> make money in? The most money I have ever had at one time is 8 pp! Is this
> normal or am I going about things all wrong?
>
>
> Thank you for your assistance my friends,
> Sir Reppik, Paladin of the 10th order
> Freeport, Bertoxxulous
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?
> http://www.ONElist.com
